name: Invisible Painting
description:
A man walks around throwing paint to expose the world around him. I like the idea of tougher games like Super Meat Boy, but mixing it with the exploration and painting features of The Unfinished Swan.

Controls

  • Use A and D to move side to side
  • Space to Jump
  • Click anywhere on the screen to shoot paint

Using walking and paint throwing, expose the world around you. Use it to find your path and hidden secrets.  If you die, an explosion of paint will help expose the area immediately around you. 

Currently implemented

  • Moving platforms
  • Pits that kill
  • Spikes that kill
  • Checkpoints

Current plans for future

  • Primarily for Android use, but open for ios and pc
  • Build in more types of platforms, obstacles, challenges, and puzzles. 
  • One big level to explore and find the end goal.
  • Items to collect along the way. 
  • Score screen to reveal number of items you collected compared to total available, and number of times died before reaching the goal.
